title: Box2d: Assertion failed: (count >= 2), function CreateChain after updating to 1.9.7
body:
#### Issue details
Game crashes on start after updating to LibGDX 1.9.7. I'm sure that it occurs due to updating to new version. When i change it back to 1.9.6 everything gets ok.

#### Here is my function to create polyline body:
```
// Code in Kotlin
fun definePolylineMapObjectBody(obj: PolylineMapObject,
                                    type: BodyDef.BodyType,
                                    cBit: Short,
                                    mBit: Short = -1): Body{
        val def = BodyDef()
        def.type = type

        val fixtureDef = FixtureDef()
        fixtureDef.restitution = .1f
        fixtureDef.friction = 1f
        fixtureDef.filter.categoryBits = cBit
        fixtureDef.filter.maskBits = mBit

        val vertices = obj.polyline.transformedVertices.clone()

        for (x in vertices.indices) vertices[x] /= PIX_PER_M

        val chainShape = ChainShape()
        chainShape.createChain(vertices)
        fixtureDef.shape = chainShape

        val body = world.createBody(def)
        body.createFixture(fixtureDef)
        body.isActive = false

        chainShape.dispose()

        return body
    }
```

#### Version of LibGDX dependency
1.9.7

#### Stacktrace
``` 
Assertion failed: (count >= 2), function CreateChain, file /Users/jenkins/workspace/libgdx-mac/extensions/gdx-box2d/gdx-box2d/jni/Box2D/Collision/Shapes/b2ChainShape.cpp, line 62.
```

#### Affected platforms
- [ +] MacOS
